title: Create FO-03 E2E test file
description:
Create E2E test for the complete FO-03 onboarding flow.

File to create:
- e2e/fo-03.test.ts

Test flow:
1. Navigate to /fo-03
2. Step 0: Click Continue
3. Step 1: Enter name, click Continue
4. Step 2: Click Start
5. Step 3: Select familiarity option, wait for confetti, auto-advance
6. Step 4: Select 2-3 topic chips, click Continue, wait for confetti
7. Step 5: Type text and/or select chips, click Continue, wait for heart animation
8. Step 6: Type text and/or select chips, click Continue, wait for heart animation
9. Step 7: Type text and/or select chips, click Continue
10. Wait for affirmation generation (60s timeout)
11. Swipe through 10 affirmations (accept some, skip some)
12. Step 8 checkpoint: Click Continue or I am good
13. Steps 10-12: Click Continue through mockup screens
14. Step 13: Verify affirmation list is displayed

Use Playwright helpers from existing tests.

Reference e2e/fo-02.test.ts for patterns.
acceptance_criteria: node --import tsx e2e/fo-03.test.ts runs without import/syntax errors (may fail on assertions initially)
closed_reason: Created e2e/fo-03.test.ts with complete test coverage: Steps 0-2 (welcome/name), Step 3 (familiarity with confetti), Step 4 (topics with confetti), Steps 5-7 (text+chips with heart animations), swipe phase with batch 1 affirmations, checkpoint handling, Steps 10-12 (mockup screens), Step 13 (completion verification). Uses existing helper functions from fo-02 pattern.
